articles.description: Liverpool agree to sign Georgia goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili from Valencia in a deal worth up to £29m.
articles.title: Liverpool agree deal to sign Georgia goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili from Valencia

articles.description: Britain's Dan Evans wins the longest match in US Open history as he beats Russia's Karen Khachanov in five hours and 35 minutes.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Dan Evans bats Karen Khachanov in New York's longest match

articles.description: Tracy Otto's ex-boyfriend thought he has killed her. Instead Otto used his attack as the launchpad for an extraordinary second act in her life.
articles.title: Tracy Otto: Paralysed by her ex-boyfriend, now a Paralympian

articles.description: An emotional Naomi Osaka makes a triumphant return to the US Open as the two-time champion beats Jelena Ostapenko in a blockbuster first round.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Naomi Osaka beats Jelena Ostapenko to make triumphant return in New York

articles.description: Dani Olmo scores the winner on his Barcelona debut against Rayo Vallecano, after finally being registered.
articles.title: Rayo Vallecano 1-2 Barcelona: Dani Olmo scores winner on debut

articles.description: Arsenal complete the signing of Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad for a fee that could reach £31.6m.
articles.title: Arsenal sign Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad
